name: Naifa Zaman
description: The company offers health and financial benefits. Well balanced management and leadership throughout the company.

name: Ikbal Hossain
description: Management was always fair. Nice machines for the most part. good friendly crew and clean.

name: Peoms
description: I was happy to see that most of our manufacturing/purchasing follows the lean manufacturing ideas (whatever they are?).

name: Sawon Saha
description: Pull parts production based on customer demand instead of pushing parts through production based on projected demand
